meanings.definition: Showing little or no emotion or animation
meanings.sent1: The stolidly man remained expressionless throughout the entire movie.
meanings.sent2: She always faced challenges stolidly, never letting her emotions show.
meanings.sent3: The stolidly cat watched the laser pointer without a flicker of interest.
meanings.sent4: His stolidly demeanor in the face of danger was both admirable and puzzling.
meanings.sent5: The stolidly mountain stood unmoved by the passing storms.

meanings.definition: In a calm and unemotional manner
meanings.sent1: She stolidly accepted the news of the canceled event.
meanings.sent2: He stolidly completed the task without any fuss.
meanings.sent3: The robot stolidly continued its work despite the chaos around it.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked stolidly in the silent room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher stolidly listened to the students' excuses before responding.
